website_summaries.verdict: Cuts similarly to other reel mowers with the added convenience of a spacious grass catcher for easy mulching. A great choice if the mulching system appeals to you.
pros: Mulching system reliably catches most clippings
cons: Blade mechanism tends to squeak after several uses
Not effective at cutting uneven lawns or thick growth

customer_reviews.title: Too easy! Actually easier to push than a motorized lawnmower ...
customer_reviews.text: You push it and it cuts the grass. Too easy! Actually easier to push than a motorized lawnmower (since it weighs less) I purchased a home and had a bunch of grass/weeds I neglected for a couple months. Used this thing and viola! It was cut. The only thing it didn't do so well was those really long pieces of crab grass(?). I think the front bumper pushes them over and then the blades don't catch it.
customer_reviews.author: Heath

customer_reviews.title: Best Lawn Mower Ever!  Use mine on over a 1/3 Acre
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the best lawnmower ever. I have used mine on uneven land, 1/3 of an acre in the rear and smaller in the front for almost 5 months, once a week with no issues. I could kiss the engineers. It might take a little more elbow grease but don't be a chump and pay for gas and suck down all the fumes. The silence is golden. Also I think my neighbors first thought I was crazy. In fact I thought I might be before I tried it, but now I am having the last laugh as they pay for a cheap mower every two years and all the gas.
customer_reviews.author: sig1ms

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I hated that my weedwhacker left my grass uneven and I didn't want a gas powered lawnmower because my yard is so small. DO NOT buy this if your yard isn't golf course flat. Mine has a tiny bit of unevenness and it was useless in some spots. I spent more time picking out teeny tiny sticks out of the blades then anything else. Sometimes it just wouldn't keep going because grass was stuck in it. I was a sweaty mess after I was done and it's a fairly cool day. Oh and you can't get it close to anything and it super clunky to turn.
customer_reviews.author: Nikita Burke

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mower!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great old fashioned style manual push mower. Great for an inner city yard that does t have much of a yard to begin with. Saves gas, the hassle and time. Also worka great in the country, cuts through most tall grass and weeds with no problem. Making sure your blade is sharp makes a great difference as well. Easy assembly, but pay attention to your blade height. Can be adjusted by the two bolts at the bottom of the mower. Very simple and just fun to use, not to mention a great cardio work out.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: It does a pretty good job of cutting the grass
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cause I wanted to be green. It does a pretty good job of cutting the grass, however, for it to work properly, your lawn needs to be completely level without any divots or holes in the yard. Mine has those things. This meant that the grass was constantly longer in some areas than others. I bought a Ryobi Battery Powered Mower now and it does a really good job on the card. I would recommend this for really small yards but nothing extensive. If you are going to be buying a Reel Mower for a bigger yard, look at the Fiskars StaySharp Reel Mower. I have heard nothing but amazing things about that.
customer_reviews.author: kr1xus7

customer_reviews.title: No more Mower starting problems!
customer_reviews.text: Small lawn, high desert region works great! We don't use the catch but it's nice having it in case it is needed. We bought a second one for Family and they use it/like it as well!
customer_reviews.author: J.H.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This mower came right on time and really does an awesome job keeping the yard in good shape. I've already mowed a few times with it and the grass looks great. The grass catcher doesn't really stay on for me, but I am pretty rough with the mower. So there's that. Overall, well worth the dough.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Blaker

customer_reviews.title: If you do not have a tree dropping small twigs it will work great. Again it is well built and good quality ...
customer_reviews.text: Very solid. The only problem, and maybe all push mowers, it will not cut real tall anything. The tall stuff just pushes over no matter which way you go at it. Also any size peace of anything will stop it in its tracks. But I would still buy it again. If you do not have a tree dropping small twigs it will work great. Again it is well built and good quality material.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Potts

customer_reviews.title: LIKE BUTTAH
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mower! Due to a medical condition, I have mobility problems and often walk with a cane. I can easily push this mower, it's really just arm action and walking behind it. It gets stuck sometimes and the big wheels will not move forward. Posts said it's because something is stuck in the blades, but I saw nothing in there. I rocked the mower back and forth, hitting the wheels on the ground, and, PRESTO, good to go! The price is great, and there's nothing like getting outside and getting some exercise!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Van Antwerp

customer_reviews.title: Cuts grass nicely. Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Cuts grass nicely. Great Value. Not as quiet as I thought it would be, but quieter than a gas powered. You could cut the lawn at 8am or 10pm without any complaints from neighbors. Will not cut weeds over about 4'' tall as mentioned in other reviews. Grass catcher is garbage, as it won't stay attached out of the box. With my small yard, the prospect of not having to worry about whether the mower will work come the first mow of the season coupled with the low price and good functionality make this a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Environmentally friendly and very low maintenance
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure this thing will work, but it really does. It has a variable height setting. The basket doesn't really pick up much of the grass. You probably will need to rake some. For a small yard, this is perfect. It is environmentally friendly, forces you to use some muscles but without straining them much and cuts the grass nicely. When finished, i just spray it with the hose to clean it and it compacts for storage so you don't get to reserve a wall in the garage for it. Once the blades start spinning, it kids of propel itself forward with little effort.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: low maitnence & quiet
customer_reviews.text: I have used this several times its great. i do not use the basket that comes with it, i got this one because it was bigger than the one with no basket in the back. Its a good alternative to a electric or gas lawn mower.I can put it in my basement & its very low maintenance i just wash the blades with a hose & carefully dry it with an old rag. Best of all i can mow my lawn any time of the day without worrying about making noise for my neighbors.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Rosseter

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Performance
customer_reviews.text: I could not wait for this device to arrive, I was not expecting the best experience but this reel mower exceeded expectations. It took only 10 minutes to put together. I started using it immediately and it cut like a charm. This thing cut way beyond my expectation, It even cut small twigs and branches. I was very impressed and recommend this product As a few folks mentioned the bag do not stay on well, I applied Velcro and was good to go. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: NikkiSimms510

customer_reviews.title: the mower works beautifully. I was surprised by the amount of noise ...
customer_reviews.text: For the small yard we have, it takes me 20 mins to mow the front and back yard. As long as you cut dry grass, the mower works beautifully. I was surprised by the amount of noise this type mower makes. The neighbors apparently thought mowers were only gas powered. The only issue would be that the mower gets stopped by the smallest of sticks, mole hills, or severely thick grass. All in all, it's a good little mower, if you're not expecting the world from a $90 mower.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Hoover

customer_reviews.title: Love my new lawn mower
customer_reviews.text: Love my new lawn mower! Its perfect for my small yard. Another reviewer was right that you should probably clear any sticks out of the grass because it stops when you hit one. I didn't have too much trouble with the really long patches - just went over them a couple of times, no biggie. Its fun and cuts really well. No gas or toxic fumes to deal with either. Added bonus - you get a nice little work out!
customer_reviews.author: rnnrgurl

customer_reviews.title: Much better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: This mower has exceeded my expectations! It is incredibly easy to use. I have .6 acre to maintain and I find myself enjoying the task. The advantage have been great. I don't have to pull start every time there is something in the yard to move or pick up and the lack of noise and fumes is awesome. Only considerations are the bagger effectiveness is based on how fast you are pushing and it's inability to handle sticks. None of which I have a problem adjusting to.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Schmucker

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I put it together in 10 mins and just strolled around the yard with it. I had to heighten the wheels bc my yard is a bit bumpy but as soon as I did that, it went smoothly all over. Can’t wow to cut this summer. Wish it came in a wider version. 16 inches is going to take a bit to mow.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Joy

customer_reviews.title: Basic product, basic performance
customer_reviews.text: Remember what you are buying. It is a light weight push mower. I have 2 small patches of grass we put in for our German Shepard. I cut and then cross cut them every weekend. It works fine. The grass catcher doesn't catch everything, but it is OK. The handle doesn't like too much torque. I'm happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: FBM

customer_reviews.title: but this push mower did the job nevertheless and I am happy that I purchased it
customer_reviews.text: This mower works just as advertised. I do not have a flat even yard, but this push mower did the job nevertheless and I am happy that I purchased it. I am still using my gas powered mower but I wanted this push mower for a quick mow job when I do not want to get out the larger mower. Excellent product and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Not That Great!
customer_reviews.text: This product was something I wanted to try instead of buying a gas powered or an electrical powered mower. I thought it would be a great idea to have but i was wrong. The clipping bag lasted about 5 seconds on my mower when I first got it. It takes some getting use to and wish that after that first go round, I should have returned it. So now I'm stuck with it since I bought it back in June or July 2017 and have only used it not even fully twice!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Get ready for a work out
customer_reviews.text: This push mower is a great way to maintain your lawn as long as you don't let the grass grow for a couple weeks. The grass catcher is worthless and unhook when you go over thick patches or I never areas. Speaking of uneven areas, this mower is not fond of dirt patches or bump on the lawn. It is a good mower but has its flaws. Don't get mad just keep at it and get a good running start. It is a good mower and cut a nice lawn.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: Assembles easily but the last step of attaching the handle to the base requires much strength to squeeze the handles in. I had to borrow a neighbor to do that. Have not used it for cutting since it’s too early in the season. But it feels very sturdy and has a nice sufficient weight to it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Pilcher

customer_reviews.title: Squeaks, grass box comes apart but works great
customer_reviews.text: Works! Downfalls are, it squeaks loud after using once, the grass bag constantly comes apart, the strap belt that the grass bag is held up on, twists and tangles, plus the hooks need to grip on. You guys would like this if these problems were fixed. Important note: 3-4 year warranty is my best bet. I'm okay with this!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Sv.

customer_reviews.title: I was hesitant to purchase this, but I gave ...
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase this, but I gave it a shot and boy, I should have went with my gut instinct. Very uneven cut and misses any dandelions you may have in your yard. If you run over a little twig, you'll have to turn it upside down and try to take it out. It's more of a hassle than what it's worth.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Very frustrating - I was looking for something simple and easy to use for a small yard
customer_reviews.text: The wheels locked and we were unable to get them to move in the forward direction at all. Very frustrating - I was looking for something simple and easy to use for a small yard. Really bummed - had to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: MOWING LIKE WHEN I WAS YOUNG
customer_reviews.text: i really love this mower. it's even made others in the house want to go outside and mow. it's great to use spur of the moment for a little mowing or long term for the entire yard. easy to use and store. cuts grass great and easily. it's a little tougher to get the weeds cut but that's the same with any mower. once i get the yard in shape it should be easy upkeep. love that i don't have to worry about the gas and the noise.
customer_reviews.author: tallyfan

customer_reviews.title: The four wheels make it very smooth and sturdy. I haven't used it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my dad, who has two small patches of grass at home. He only wants a push mower, not a gas or electric powered one! He loves this lawnmower! The four wheels make it very smooth and sturdy. I haven't used it, but my dad loves it, so I am happy! I would recommend for anyone looking for a push mower.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: Does ok for what it is
customer_reviews.text: It does ok. It seems to have trouble cutting some of the grass. but I know I don't have a perfect lawn so I'm not expecting much. After about 4 uses the bearings squeal like a banshee even after I oiled it up.
customer_reviews.author: Cascadia

customer_reviews.title: Very nice mower
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for 2 months now, I mow my Bermuda grass at 3/4" and this mower is smooth and pleasant to use. The grass catcher is useless to me, the only way to get the grass to land in it is to walk really fast. I prefer to mow slowly, so my clippings don't fly back far enough to reach the catcher. The handle has a nice grip and the bends in it give me plenty of options for pushing and keeping leverage for the thicker, tougher patches of grass. I'm 6' tall and mow 1/2 acre with it.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Rusche

customer_reviews.title: Won't Cut Full Width
customer_reviews.text: Mower is very hard to push and no matter how I adjust the reel it will only cut on the left side. Only get about nine inches of cut with each pass so it takes twice as long to mow the yard. If I adjust the reel any closer on the right side the reel binds and is impossible to push. Going to see if I can return.
customer_reviews.author: KKR

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and quality performance!
customer_reviews.text: Our property yard isn’t huge by any means but it is certainly sizeable. Have always used a gas mower or ride on mower but after moving into the new property, we were looking to cut cost. Surprisingly, the Remington RM3000 cuts likes a beast! Lightweight and smooth performance! Best of all, minimal maintenance and no more daily trips to gas up!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. & Mrs. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: I got rid of it and got a real mower after a few months of trying to make it work
customer_reviews.text: If you're mowing a perfectly even section of grass - say a putting green - then maybe this would work. Add a few tree roots, uneven ground, and southern centipede grass, and you need a real mower - the kind with a motor on it.
customer_reviews.author: Sailor Steve

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my push mower! My yard is very small so I had no need of a power mower. You will get a work out which is just another plus! Cute the grass well. Super fast and easy to assemble. Very satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Pushed her this evening for the first time. It had rained early and the grass was about 10-12 inches,well weeds really and some fine orchard grass. Probably took double cutting for the most part till I lowered it after the first cutting and it done fairly well kinda double pushing it. Should do good in ideal conditions
customer_reviews.author: David Humberd

customer_reviews.title: Product is sturdy and high quality
customer_reviews.text: Product is sturdy and high quality! Its for someone who can cut grass every other day! If your grass is more than an inch tall; forget about it!! You need a real lawn mower machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The mower is noisy and the height adjustment is so ...
customer_reviews.text: The mower is noisy and the height adjustment is so lose on one side and tight on the other. The loose side changes on its own and makes for uneven mowing. I tried to tighten the nut but it loosened up right away. Also, the first time I used it the foam rubber on the handle started to rip off.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda M.

customer_reviews.title: Clippings bag does not work
customer_reviews.text: We bought this mower specifically because it had the best reviews for a clipping catcher bag among reel mowers. The bag did not work, not even a little bit. It constantly collapsed on itself and we ended up just removing it. It worked so-so as a mower, requiring several passes and a lot of manual effort. I wished I had returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst reel mower I ever had
customer_reviews.text: Worst reel mower I ever had. Pure Junk! Don't waste your time and money with Remington. They also have terrible customer service too. When you call the average wait time is 20 minutes and the "service centers" they provide are either out of business or simply refuse to work on Remington reel mowers. I found out the hard way and unfortunately it cost me $75.00. Do not buy this! Shame on them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible! Dont waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible! Dont waste your money! the bag to collect the clippings falls off constantly and the mower its self is extremely difficult to use! returning this has a nightmare!
customer_reviews.author: melody pond

customer_reviews.title: ... cut remotely thick grass or expect to cut grass like weeds. This doesn't cut weeds at all
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy if you want to cut remotely thick grass or expect to cut grass like weeds. This doesn't cut weeds at all, and doesn't adjust to be very high. The handle cover also ripped off after light use a second time. I will use it as a secondary mower as I waited too long to use it and passed the return eligible date. I regret buying this mower.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the mower
customer_reviews.text: This cuts clean and fast, no gas to worry about. The height settings work well for me. Rocks and twigs will stop the mower, but with a gas powered mower, those same impediments can get thrown out at high velocity. I let the clippings fall where they may to feed the lawn. Very happy with the mower.
customer_reviews.author: See jay

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good quality for a push mower
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good quality for a push mower. Sturdy design, not too heavy. The adjustments work well. It's hard to push and doesn't cut the thicker grass stalks or weeds but I feel like that's probably most push mowers. (If you want clean and easy, get a powered one)
customer_reviews.author: Haley Barela

customer_reviews.title: good cut. One of the height adjusters was a ...
customer_reviews.text: I had the mower for about at least 4 months. Solid construction, good cut. One of the height adjusters was a bit bent so it didn't like to stay in the notch, but a few hits with the hammer and it sits just fine now. Wheels are about 3inches past the outside of the blades and as with most manual push mowers, a twig, branch, or a thick enough piece of cardboard will stop you in your tracks. It pushes easy as long as you aren't trying to cut 6+ inches of grass. I'd buy it again, but this one hasn't broken yet.
customer_reviews.author: Chipp

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your $$$ on this
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your $$$ on this, it won't hold up to anything but light work. I bought it and broke it before I finished the yard at my new place. The last owner only let the yard go for a month, and the effort it took to cut through the tall grass also broke the plastic gears that spin the blades. Waste of $$$ and time.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Great reel mower
customer_reviews.text: Great reel mower, easy to put together, only reason I gave 4 stars instead of 5 is because you have to go over the real tall stuff multiple times before it can get it cut down. Other than that, it's perfect for us.
customer_reviews.author: S. Plum

customer_reviews.title: This works well.
customer_reviews.text: I don't exactly have a small lawn but this guy at least shaves off the top of grass blades. Harder work than my EZ Walk mower, defiantly, but that is awaiting parts on order. Amazed neighbors these are still made. At least I can get the lawn trimmed! I didn't put the grass catcher on.
customer_reviews.author: BDS

customer_reviews.title: Remington Reel Push Mower
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and handle. I like all the options on cutting lengths. Though the grass catcher is pretty much useless to me. It comes off a lot while pushing the mower at least for me.
customer_reviews.author: Roger C.

customer_reviews.title: Better than a motorized mower in multiple ways
customer_reviews.text: I used this lawn mower for a year and am very happy with it. It is far more quiet than any motorized mower and gives you a minor workout while also not polluting.
customer_reviews.author: Manth

customer_reviews.title: the better the cutting
customer_reviews.text: This thing cuts grass extremely well. I don't think it was meant to cut grass that is 5-6 inches high, but it will do it! A lot easier to use when the grass isn't so high. It took some work, but the mower did its job..The faster the blades go, the better the cutting. The grass catcher didn't work well for me when I tried, but chances are it works better as well with the grass lower; although I do not plan on using this moving forward. Solid mower for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Lajoie

customer_reviews.title: This is not a bad mower for smaller lawns
customer_reviews.text: This is not a bad mower for smaller lawns. It does a decent job cutting down the blades. It has a little difficulty on the edges, or when the surface is not flat. Otherwise, happy with the mower for my small lawn.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Misses a good bit of grass and you sort of have to ...
customer_reviews.text: Mediocre push reel mower. Assembly is a breeze. Misses a good bit of grass and you sort of have to mow everything twice with it. Went back to gas mower after a couple attempts.
customer_reviews.author: David Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Good mower for smaller lots
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mower as my first mower after moving into a house. I have operated a regular gas push mower and can say this is much easier to push around without the need to buy gas. Check Walmart before you buy this mower is atleast 10 dollars cheaper on Walmart.com.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It cuts grasses very well. However, the bag kept on falling no matter how I tie it up. It is not very noisy as well. Delivery was fast and assembly was very easy. Overall I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dess26

customer_reviews.title: Thoroughly satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Just used my new Remington Reel mower for the first time and it was amazing. Took me back to when I would cut my grandfather's grass as a kid. A breeze to put together, very clean cutting, and easy to use. Hopefully this love and nostalgia will continue for many cuts to come. And for $70 definitely a great buy and cheaper than the big box stores.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Not too heavy and seems sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Was able to mow my lawn, even the super thick and long grass and weeds. Just put it at the highest height setting and went over it multiple times. Now that it is mowed, it should be super easy to keep it trim.
customer_reviews.author: Susan H

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: the smallest twig will lock up the mower, and if your grass or weeds are more than 4 inches high, forget about this mower cutting it. Rear wheels bent after second use.
customer_reviews.author: Jim H.

customer_reviews.title: Handle is little flimsy & the grass catcher falls off ...
customer_reviews.text: Handle is little flimsy & the grass catcher falls off the rail continuously. Difficult to keep ur lines straight do to the blades not extending all the way out to the wheels
customer_reviews.author: John Jacobi

customer_reviews.title: A great mower. Gives as good a cut as any ...
customer_reviews.text: A great mower. Gives as good a cut as any gas mower if you go over some areas twice. The collection bag doesn't catch it all of course, but it catches enough. It does the job. Only drawback with something of this caliber, is that a tiny twig will seize it up on you. So, just remember that. You'll be stopped in your tracks now and then and you'll just use your foot to back off the blade and eject the twig. Its quiet enough to mow at dusk or early morning if you like.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: It amazingly works really well better than I expected and much quieter than gas mower
customer_reviews.text: Great exercise cuts the it really well don't have to deal with winterizing carburetors
customer_reviews.author: the video guy

customer_reviews.title: This mower works great on my yard
customer_reviews.text: This mower works great on my yard. It is quiet and easy to push. My yard is pretty flat so that makes a difference, but overall I am extremely pleased with this.
customer_reviews.author: Langley Shazor

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought one it's an amazing tool especially if you want to exercise while doing something useful like cutting grass
customer_reviews.author: bafforsekyere

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: Not sharp enough. Even after multiple passes I still had stragglers the same height as when I started. Plus it clogs constantly. Update! I decided to give it another try to avoid returning it. Now the thing refuses to turn and makes a loud screeching sound. Returning ASAP!
customer_reviews.author: BluePhoenix

customer_reviews.title: Worked exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to assemble and worked perfectly. I was able to mow our little front and back lawns in about 5 minutes each. I can't remember why I ever had a gas powered mower.
customer_reviews.author: PenasquitosShopper

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I really like this push mower. It is super easy to use and safe enough for my older children to operate. It mows the lawn quite well as long as the grass/weeds are not too long. The shorter the grass, the better it cuts.
customer_reviews.author: MXT

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box; handles are thin and weak, something rattling inside one of the wheels and the grass catcher is to small. While cutting, the blades throw the grass up and over the top in front of the mower and not into the catcher. I guess they figured you wouldn't need a larger grass catcher as the grass isn't directed into it anyway? To get an even cut I had to mow the same area 2-3 times. This mower was back in the box for return within 30 minutes. Still no idea what was loose and rattling in the right wheel.
customer_reviews.author: R. Schubert

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to take care of cutting grass on side yard. Attachable bag doesn't stay attached very well and doesn't hold much.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mower, easy to use and quiet
customer_reviews.text: As advertised and very easy to use. In about an hour and a half my husband mowed more than half of our yard. We have almost an acre. This is quiet and easy to use. Lightweight, but does take a but of bsck strength to maintain a steady pace. Sticks get caught up, but that's normal. With a bit of force it breaks thru the stick or you can reverse and it'll usually dislodge the stick. Super easy to use and completely eco-friendly! We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for a small patch of grass
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for a small patch of grass! Has several different levels, I'm not sure what other reviewers were talking about how it doesn't work on unleveled surfaces, mine works great!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Saved money paying a lawnnower man
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these when I was young and decided to buy it for this Millenium
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Cesar Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Simple solution for a small lawn.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Easily assembled and works great. the only heads up is that if your lawn is not very level, it might be difficult to navigate through.
customer_reviews.author: Odry

customer_reviews.title: A Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: A breeze to put together and use, this is perfect for my small yard.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya D

customer_reviews.title: I love my reel mower it works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I love my reel mower it works perfectly. I will be ordering a sharpening kit for it. I told my mother I had gotten one and she said that my granddaddy swore by them.
customer_reviews.author: liz demoss

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The clippings bag doesn't work well grass comes out of it when trying to dump it.
customer_reviews.author: jesse self

customer_reviews.title: Great mower. We use it on a smaller yard at a duplex.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. If you have longer or wet grass, it will need to be cleaned at the wheels (but that's to be expected on a reel mower)
customer_reviews.author: Ken Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Love this mower.
customer_reviews.text: This product works great. I leave the basket off and the clippings seem to act as a natural fertilizer.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Mower cuts fine when the grass has been trimmed consistently
customer_reviews.text: Mower cuts fine when the grass has been trimmed consistently, but has difficulty with tall grass or when it hasnt been cut on a consistent basis. The catcher is useless. grass trimmings tend to fly over, so you may want to mow without it and collect the trimmings the old fashioned way - rake and broom.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Ancheta

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I have a 1/4 acer lot and this little mower dose a great job and is easy to push. My yard hasnt looked this good in years roatery mower is the way to go!
customer_reviews.author: P.pep85

customer_reviews.title: I returned it because I have to make more than ...
customer_reviews.text: I returned it because I have to make more than 1 pass to meow my lawn, but it looks solid.
customer_reviews.author: C. AN

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mower for the price, especially for places a ride-on cannot go.
customer_reviews.text: An excellent mower for the price. We have a grass-covered berm on our yard that our ride-on mower can’t mow properly, so I purchased this manual mower for the job. It is perfect, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Barney

customer_reviews.title: This would be perfect for a townhouse
customer_reviews.text: Really hard to push but it works. Unfortunately our yard is a little too large so we bought a battery operated mower instead. This would be perfect for a townhouse.
customer_reviews.author: alex e

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Bought as back up mower
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Bought as back up mower, now use it as main one. I have 1/2 a lot. It does a great job and gives a decent work out at same time. Easy to use and put together.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, Just what we wanted. Will buy from again without hesitation. Thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Koch

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this awhile back for my small yard, but after a few used, it started missing grass completely. Not only that, it is now making a terrible screeching noise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING so worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Amazing love this mower now our children below age 10 can help Dad mow, with supervision and no fear of them loosing a foot or other limb.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Boyles

customer_reviews.title: She has only used it once so far and is very pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 80 years-old mother who insists on mowing her own small yard. She has only used it once so far and is very pleased with it. She did have some difficultly in the assembly of this mower, the directions were in small print and not very clear.
customer_reviews.author: b. deets

customer_reviews.title: Works great, would recommend to anyone who has a smaller ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great, would recommend to anyone who has a smaller yard and does not mind pushing the mower. IF you have longer grass you need to have some speed for it to cut everything, even then you might have to go over your yard twice to make sure you get everything evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with the results we got using this mower. It was a definite improvement over our previous one.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Marie Schmid

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product, it's fast and so easy to use that my three and a half year old grandson uses it with supervision of course. My husband lifted It out of the box and my daughter assembled it.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth K

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The first time was hard but it now works easily and I enjoy using it
customer_reviews.author: Jrod

customer_reviews.title: If your only gonna cut it once
customer_reviews.text: This product is sort of does the job for one or 2 cuts. But after that the blade becomes very dull. Also it doesn't cut weeds that are bigger than the grass. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: michael uffendell

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Difficult with taller grass as some of the other reviews have read, and the blades can get jammed when cutting tall grass, but it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Grandison

customer_reviews.title: Easy to push
customer_reviews.text: Easy to push, and does a decent job on the grass. Only con is that it is hard to maneuver around obstacles.
customer_reviews.author: tmeaster

customer_reviews.title: extensive height adjustment
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I have a postage stamp lawn (ok, maybe 2 or 3 stamps), and this is just what the lawn care physician ordered.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: wrong type lawn for this mower
customer_reviews.text: Probably works great on flat even ground but didn't work to good for my lawn.
customer_reviews.author: SEZ

customer_reviews.title: This was easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to put together. It pushed easy across the lawn, but was harder where the lawn was not so flat. I haven't used it much yet, but got it for times when I couldn't use other tools.
customer_reviews.author: Athena Baron

customer_reviews.title: Great Push Mower
customer_reviews.text: Very well engineered push mower, works well on medium to light cutting.
customer_reviews.author: Mr . Hammon

customer_reviews.title: would not purchase this again or even recommend
customer_reviews.text: This only works on flat, even, short grass. would not purchase this again or even recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The grass catcher attachment easily falls off but a good product for the price ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well for its purpose. The grass catcher attachment easily falls off but a good product for the price paid.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: does the job
customer_reviews.text: Bag doesn't work well but out catches most the grass. Doesn`t work well for us on long grass without a running start but it is great exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Katanajo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, affordable, doesn't require mixing fuel. Definitely a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kody A.

product_meta.title: Remington RM3100 18-Inch Reel Push Mower
product_meta.description: Style:RM3100Not every yard needs an expensive lawn mower. This unit is push operated and is equipped with a dual lever height adjustment making it easy to find the height that works best for you. The RM1300 operates best on modest terrain conquering light to medium duty yardwork. This mower has a durable 5-blade adjustable reel to provide maximum performance. Adjustable cutting height positions from 0.75-2.5-inches featuring an 18-inch cutting path gives you the ability to cut the lawn the way you desire. The collection bag is included for your use to catch all your clippings while operating. This item is backed by a 2-year limited warranty for the assurance of quality you need.
feature_bullets: This mower's 18-inch cutting path makes it ideal for light or medium duty yard work, or areas that require special attention
Environmentally friendly with no gas required while cutting
Durable 5-blade adjustable reel cuts with ease
The 2-in-1 mulching feature allows you to collect clippings while you mow
Equipped with a dual lever height adjustment making it easy to find the height that works best for you

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars361 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
